name: Nogareru
description:
You’ve crashed landed on an alien planet whose inhabitants are less than friendly. Hunted by unknown creatures, your only defense is to run or hide. Utilize alien skulls and gain extraterrestrial powers to evade the monstrosities and find the remaining survivors left to escape. Will you survive alongside your fellow space-travelers or become another skull left behind on planet Nogareru?

This is a first-person sci-fi horror game.
